```py
n!! = 2 ** (n / 2) * gamma(n / 2 + 1) * sqrt(2 / pi)  n odd
    = 2 ** (n / 2) * gamma(n / 2 + 1)                 n even
    = 2 ** (n / 2) * (n / 2)!                         n even 
```

```py
>>> from scipy.special import factorial2
>>> factorial2(7, exact=False)
array(105.00000000000001)
>>> factorial2(7, exact=True)
105 
```
